docs.text: Software Guidebook This is an exemplar layout for a software guidebook , written following the template described by Simon Brown's The software guidebook - A guide to documenting your software architecture . If you are reading this on a Confluence wiki somewhere, the original source of this document is on GitHub . Table of Contents Context Functional Overview Quality Attributes Constraints Principles Software Architecture Code Data Infrastructure Architecture Deployment Operation and Support Development Environment Decision Log
